verbs.description: The vote [V: is] widely viewed as a signal of whether Trump and the Republicans can hold on to Congress in November .
[ARG1: The vote] is [ARGM-MNR: widely] [V: viewed] [ARG2: as a signal of whether Trump and the Republicans can hold on to Congress in November] .
The vote is widely viewed as a signal of whether Trump and the Republicans [V: can] hold on to Congress in November .
The vote is widely viewed as a signal of whether [ARG0: Trump and the Republicans] [ARGM-MOD: can] [V: hold] on [ARG1: to Congress] [ARGM-TMP: in November] .
